entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView DataTemplateSelector NullReferenceException #9833
  • Xaml for MAUI tvOS and Android TV #9829
  • [Android] Scrolls conflicts with nested ScrollView(s) (CarouselView, CollectionView, ListView) #9827
  • [iOS] Wrong sizing of layouts #9825
  • Control Templates do not have a way to access elements in Control Templates #9817
    Backlog
  • Add IsTrimmable=False attribute to non-trimmable assemblies #9816
    7.0-rc2
  • Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812
  • Border in ScrollView will flicker when scroll on Android #9805
    Backlog
  • Add support for custom handling of Android back button in Blazor Hybrid apps #9804
    Backlog
  • Changing properties on MauiIcon, MauiImage and MauiSplashScreen sometimes does not regenerate images #9803
    7.0
  • [Bug] FlyoutPage's FlyoutLayoutBehavior value is always 'Split' on Android, causing it unable to manually set IsPresented = false properly #9801
  • Pair to Mac failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower..." #9800

Closed

  • [Android] ContentViewHandler is incompatible #7884
  • Server-side rendering support #9537
  • The CreatePlatformView is never called? #9720
  • Add better support for Android 12+ Splash Screen APIs #9794
    6.0-sr5
  • MediaPicker returns the page set by default in the shell #9810
    Backlog
  • Set or Get Row & Column Properties. #9774
  • Was the issue with MAUI project templates appearing for VS Preview resolved? #9777
  • get_IsLoaded throws ObjectDisposed exception #9806
    6.0-sr5
  • Cannot scroll Scrollview on iOS when content dynamically resized #9798
  • Frame inside CollectionView unable to be selected in Android #8805
  • SwipeView in CollectionView Faults on Windows #9423
    Backlog
  • Why Entry and Button that are covered by other layout can still get the focus. #9514
  • [Android] Runtime Property Update is not working for InputTransparent #7682
    Backlog
  • Input Transparent not working properly (Android Simulator) when BoxView has InputTransparent set to true and then set to false in backend code. #7498
    Backlog
  • dotnet6.0-maccatalyst: Linking fails on native reference dylib #9808
  • [Bug] Valid splash screen colors populated from SKColor #2170
    6.0-sr5
  • Adding resx file for additional language gives an error while trying to build iOS project #6076
    Backlog
  • Changing the default appicon doesn't work. #7786
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Windows] App Icon behaves randomly #7200
    Backlog
  • [Android] Icon shows default android image when ForegroundFile in MauiIcon is not set #7203
  • [Android] MauiIcon Color and TintColor doesn't work #7206
  • Can not change the vertical and horizontal if the MauiSplashScreen #4684
    Backlog
  • [Android] SplashScreen Scalingproblem #7768
  • Splash Screen does not resize(Scaling Issue) #4341
    Backlog
  • AppIcons and Splash Screens Do Not Render Correctly on Physical Devices #9029
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [workload] Improve pack name suffix consistency #9831
    area/setup 🪄
  • [workload] Trim dot from pack names and alias #9830
    area/setup 🪄
  • Maui.Graphics uses the same version as MAUI #9828
  • Update the "previous" maui version #9826
    7.0-rc1
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending BindableProperty known type converters #9815
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 3.2.8 to 3.2.9 #9813
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix issue with offsets in Frame gradient background #9809
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-frame

Merged

  • [Android] Avoid crash in IsLoaded View extension method (if controls is disposed) #9811
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, high, 6.0-sr5
  • [Tizen] Update handling IconPressed event of MauiToolbar #9769
    community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.3.0 to 17.3.1 #9779
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [.NET 6] Backport WinForms & WPF CSS Hot Reload Fixes #9787
    area/blazor 🕸️, feature-blazor-windesktop, 6.0-sr5
  • Correctly size the Android 12 splash screen #9797
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖, 6.0-sr5
  • [Maps] Fix map userlocation #9789
    area/Maps🗺
  • Fix unit tests #9802
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add repro link field on issue template #9807
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Grey color overloads #9788
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr5
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22426.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22429.1 #9778
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • GitHub Workflows security hardening #9790
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Update SkiaGraphicsView.Tizen.cs #9767
    community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖
